description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Dialog component.

title.description: The title text to display at the top of the dialog box.
title.label: Title

subText.description: The content text to display inside the dialog box, directly under the Title.
subText.label: Subtext

isBlocking.description: Determines if the Dialog should block dismissing until the user clicks a button.
isBlocking.label: Is Blocking

open.description: Specifies whether this Dialog component is open.
open.label: Open

contains.description: Any contents that needs to be rendered inside the Dialog.
contains.label: Contains

footer.description: Any contents that needs to be rendered inside the Dialog's footer area.
footer.label: Footer

showClose.description: Should a close button be rendered, to allow the user to dismiss the Dialog.
showClose.label: Show Close

fullScreen.description: Should the Dialog be full screen?
fullScreen.label: Full Screen

maxWidth.description: The maximum width of the Dialog.
maxWidth.label: Max Width
